products.title: Unilux PVC Blackout Topaz Blue 89mm Vertical Blind
products.metadescription: Unilux PVC Blackout Topaz Blue 89mm Vertical Blind in Blue. Made to measure from £13.33 with FREE UK mainland delivery. This 89mm Vertical Blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
A durable, moisture resistant and long lasting collection that is available in a range of stunning shades. This blue vertical blind is very durable and the perfect choice for your bathroom or kitchen as it is moisture resistant and colourful.
 
 Product ID: SDB-VTB0593 Fabric Colour: Topaz Blue Material: Fiberglass core laminated with PVC layered coating Lining: Colour Match Backing - See Sample Headrail: White Slimline Headrail Supported By White Steel Brackets - Top or Face Fixable     Slat Width: 89mm Control Type: Smooth Chain Operation with Cord tilt OR Wand Tilt and Pull Energy Saving Rating: ER3 - Highest Energy Saving Value - UV Protection and Effective Thermal Retention Blackout: Yes

products.title: Unilux Butter (Moisture Resistant)
products.metadescription: Buy made to measure Unilux Butter (Moisture Resistant) Bathroom Vertical Blinds from SoEasy Blinds. Order quality Bathroom Vertical Blinds online today at low prices with fast UK delivery
products.productdescription:
Min Width: 250mm Max Width: 5000mm
 	Min Drop: 500mm Max Drop: 3500mm
 	Fabric Composition: PVC
 	Louvre Width: 89mm
 	Guarantee: 12 Months
 	Fittings: Included
 	Controls: Cord control to open/close and beaded chrome chain to tilt louvres, or wand control to open/close and twist wand to tilt louvres.
 	Stack: A choice of left, right or split.
 	Louvres: Louvres are supplied with top hangers and are available with bottom weights with stabilising chain or chainless bottom weights.
